#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
#define LD long double
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define bitcount _builtin_popcount
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 1000090

int N,i;
LD A,F,angle;
string str;

template<typename T>T absll(T X)
{
	if(X<0)
		return -1*X;
	else
		return X;
}


int main()
{
	cin>>N;
	cin>>str;
	cin>>A>>F;
	
	angle=0.000;
	int flip=1;
	for(i=0;i<str.length();i++)
	{
		if(str[i]=='L')
		{
			angle-=A;
		}
		else if(str[i]=='R')
		{
			angle+=A;
		}
		if(absll(angle)>F)
		{
			flip^=1;
			break;
		}
	}
	
	if(flip)
	{
		cout<<"YES\n";
	}
	else
	{
		cout<<"NO\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
